faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address common concerns and queries regarding property acquisition, documentation, and the investment potential of two-bedroom apartments in this rapidly evolving Gurugram sector.

faqs.question: What is the typical size range for a 2BHK Flat in Sector 90 Gurugram and how does pricing compare
faqs.answer: The typical built-up area for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90 Gurugram generally ranges from 900 sq ft to 1300 sq ft depending on the builder and the specific project category luxury or affordable housing. Pricing is highly competitive usually starting lower than properties closer to the main Gurugram central business district. The price per square foot offers superior value given the new construction and excellent future connectivity making it an accessible entry point for genuine homebuyers and investors alike.

faqs.question: Is Sector 90 considered a good investment area for residential property right now
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 90 is widely regarded as an excellent investment area particularly for smaller units like 2BHK flats. It is strategically positioned near major growth drivers like Dwarka Expressway and industrial hubs ensuring strong capital appreciation potential. Infrastructure work is nearing completion in many parts of the sector which historically leads to significant price appreciation shortly after completion and occupancy.

faqs.question: Are ready-to-move 2BHK options available in Sector 90 or only under construction
faqs.answer: Sector 90 offers a healthy mix of both ready-to-move RTM and under-construction UC 2BHK flats. Ready-to-move inventory is highly favored by end-users seeking immediate occupancy, while the under-construction projects often come with more attractive payment plans and a lower entry price point suitable for long-term investors. We maintain an updated database covering both categories across major developments.

faqs.question: What are the common amenities provided with a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Modern 2BHK residential complexes in Sector 90 typically include comprehensive lifestyle amenities. These often feature 24/7 security surveillance, power backup, high-speed elevators, designated parking spaces, children's play areas, and landscaped gardens. Premium projects may also offer sports facilities, dedicated clubhouses, gymnasium access, and swimming pools enhancing the overall resident experience significantly.

faqs.question: What documents are required to secure a 2BHK flat purchase in Sector 90
faqs.answer: To proceed with the purchase of a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90 Gurugram, you will need standard documents including identity proof Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, address proof, and income verification documents such as salary slips or tax returns if seeking a home loan. For RERA-approved properties, the builder must provide the allotment letter, builder-buyer agreement, and occupancy certificate if applicable, ensuring legal clarity throughout the transaction.

faqs.question: How is the water and power supply infrastructure in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: As a newly planned sector, Sector 90 benefits from modern civic planning. Water supply is typically managed through both municipal pipelines and borewells with many societies implementing water treatment plants. Electricity supply is generally reliable with most high-rise 2BHK projects offering mandatory 100% power backup for common areas and partial backup for individual units ensuring minimal disruption to daily life.

faqs.question: Can I get a home loan easily for a 2BHK Flat in RERA registered projects here
faqs.answer: Yes obtaining a home loan is straightforward for RERA registered 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 90. Most major banks and financial institutions have already approved projects in this sector due to clear titles and legal compliance. We can connect you with preferred banking partners who offer competitive interest rates and streamlined loan processing for Gurugram properties.

faqs.question: What makes 2BHK flats more appealing than 3BHK flats in this specific location
faqs.answer: 2BHK flats are generally more appealing in Sector 90 due to their lower total cost and higher affordability, making them accessible to a wider demographic of buyers including first-time homeowners and investors focused on rental yield. They require lower maintenance and property tax compared to larger units while still providing sufficient space for small families, leading to quicker sales and better liquidity.

faqs.question: What is the distance from Sector 90 to the main Cyber City business hub
faqs.answer: Sector 90 is approximately 25 to 30 kilometers away from the Cyber City business hub. However the improved connectivity via NH-48 and the Dwarka Expressway ensures that the driving time is typically manageable depending on traffic conditions. With ongoing road network enhancements, the commute efficiency is constantly improving, positioning Sector 90 as a viable residential option for professionals working there.

faqs.question: Are there green spaces and parks near the 2BHK residential areas in Sector 90
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 90 Gurugram has been planned to include ample green spaces. Most modern 2BHK apartment complexes dedicate significant area to internal landscaped gardens, parks, and recreational zones. Additionally, the overall sector planning incorporates neighborhood parks ensuring residents have access to natural environments for leisure and exercise fostering a healthy community lifestyle.
